column1: # Monthly poll of forecasters. Covers percentage change and the highest/lowest forecast of real GDP, percentage change in CPI and the current account as a percentage of GDP.

# As of December 2010 participants were Bank of America, BNP Paribas, Citigroup, Commerzbank, Decision Economics, Deutsche Bank, EIU, Goldman Sachs, HSBC Securities, ING, JPMorgan Chase, KBC Bank, Morgan Stanley, RBS, Schroders, Scotiabank, Societé Générale, Standard Chartered & UBS.
